oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Johnson's Island Prison
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1st Lt. W. P. Anthony, Co. C, 30th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, wrote to his wife Bettie Anderson of Hartsville, Tenn. from Johnson's Island Prison in Lake Erie, Ohio, sharing news about prison life and family. The envelope has examiner markings from the prison. According to his service record, Anthony was captured at Ft. Donelson on February 16, 1862 and transferred to Johnson's Island on April 24, 1862. The letter is incorrectly dated 1861.
